bibliographic-data.invention-title: Optimizing execution of trading orders based on trading order metric

abstract.p: A system for processing trading orders comprises an optimizer module operable to receive a first trading order and a second trading order. The optimizer module is further operable to receive market data associated with at least one market center. The optimizer module is further operable to determine whether to transmit the second trading order to the at least one market center prior to transmitting the first trading order to the at least one market center, the determination based at least in part on the market data.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System for optimizing execution of trading orders

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR OPTIMIZING EXECUTION OF TRADING ORDERS
SYSTEM FÜR OPTIMIERTE AUSFÜHRUNG VON HANDELSAUFTRÄGEN
SYSTÈME PERMETTANT D'OPTIMISER L'EXÉCUTION D'ORDRES COMMERCIAUX
SYSTEM FOR OPTIMIZING EXECUTION OF TRADING ORDER

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To increase liquidity in the market price by reducing delay for processing realistic trading order.

SOLUTION: A system for processing trading orders comprises an optimizer module operable to receive a first trading order and a second trading order. The optimizer module is further operable to receive market data associated with at least one market center. The optimizer module is further operable to determine whether to transmit the second trading order to the at least one market center prior to transmitting the first trading order to the at least one market center, and the determination is based at least in part on the market data.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for optimizing execution of trading orders

abstract.p: A system for processing trading orders comprises an optimizer module operable to receive a first trading order and a second trading order. The optimizer module is further operable to receive market data associated with at least one market center. The optimizer module is further operable to determine whether to transmit the second trading order to the at least one market center prior to transmitting the first trading order to the at least one market center, the determination based at least in part on the market data.

abstract.p: A system for processing trading orders comprises an optimizer module operable to receive a first trading order and a second trading order. The optimizer module is further operable to receive market data associated with at least one market center. The optimizer module is further operable to determine whether to transmit the second trading order to the at least one market center prior to transmitting the first trading order to the at least one market center, the determination based at least in part on the market data.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR OPTIMIZING EXECUTION OF TRADING ORDERS
SYSTÈME PERMETTANT D'OPTIMISER L'EXÉCUTION D'ORDRES COMMERCIAUX

abstract.p: A system for processing trading orders comprises an optimizer module operable to receive a first trading order and a second trading order. The optimizer module is further operable to receive market data associated with at least one market center. The optimizer module is further operable to determine whether to transmit the second trading order to the at least one market center prior to transmitting the first trading order to the at least one market center, the determination based at least in part on the market data.

L'invention concerne un système de traitement d'ordres commerciaux qui comprend un module d'optimisation conçu pour recevoir un premier ordre commercial et un deuxième ordre commercial. Le module d'optimisation est également conçu pour recevoir des données de marché associées à au moins un centre de marché. Ledit module d'optimisation est en outre conçu pour déterminer si le deuxième ordre commercial doit être transmis à ou aux centres de marché avant de transmettre le premier ordre commercial à ou aux centres de marché, la détermination étant fondée au moins partiellement sur les données de marché.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR OPTIMIZING EXECUTION OF TRADING ORDERS
SYSTÈME PERMETTANT D'OPTIMISER L'EXÉCUTION D'ORDRES COMMERCIAUX
